thread.title: Oscars 2017: Viola Davis wins Best Supporting Actress for Fences
thread.title_full: Oscars 2017: Viola Davis wins Best Supporting Actress for Fences

title: Oscars 2017: Viola Davis wins Best Supporting Actress for Fences
text:
CATCH ALL LIVE UPDATES FROM OSCARS 2017 HERE 
Fences directed by and starring Denzel Washington is an adaptation of a Pulitzer Prize-winning play of the same name written by August Wilson. 
Fences is the story of an African-American man who struggles to raise his family in '50s America while life keeps throwing unexpected surprises at him. 
Viola Davis plays the role of Rose Lee Maxson, the wife of Troy Maxson (Denzel Washington), the protagonist of the film. Viola is best-known for her performances in the 2011 film The Help and the TV series How To Get Away With Murder. 
ALSO WATCH: Breaking down Oscars 2017 To get the latest entertainment news and gossip, follow us on Twitter @Showbiz_IT and Like us on facebook.com/IndiaToday For news and videos in Hindi, go to AajTak.in . ताज़ातरीन ख़बरों और वीडियो के लिए आजतक.इन पर आएं.
